token.Bitcoin Security for all Bockchains: Lorem Bitcoin Security for all Bockchains
token.aboutPoP: Lorem...Using our novel Proof-of-Proof (PoP) consensus protocol, the Veriblock blockchain acts as a fully distributed, trustless, transparent, and permissionless (DTTP) security adapter which allows every blockchain to operate with the full security of Bitcoin.
token.aboutSecurity: Lorem...This security encourages the adoption of these blockchains which address Bitcoin’s feature limitations. The transition of transactions from Bitcoin to these more specialized blockchains addresses Bitcoin’s scaling problems, while continuing to drive value back to Bitcoin miners and token holders. As this value is channeled back to Bitcoin, more miners allocate more hashing power to securing Bitcoin and competing for the block reward, further strengthening Bitcoin’s dominance as the world’s greatest utility of immutable proof.
